resources.string:
Hi, my name is Nolverto. 

 I love to learn new things about programming languages. 

 I like to listen instrumental and electronic music. 

 I love to play with dogs, walk and swimming 

 I would be really happy to help you learning a programming language or solving some problems 

 I like to eat chinese and mexican food. 

 My soccer team is Chivas of Guadalajara. 

 I like to think that some day Mexico soccer team will be the champion of the world cup. 

 I like riding bycicle. 

 In my free times i like to solve jigsaw puzzles with my girlfriend.
